directions: In a bowl large enough to hold the chicken, stir together the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, paprika, cumin, coriander, ginger, salt and cayenne. Add the chicken and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Prepare a medium-hot fire in a grill and oil the grill rack.

Divide the chicken pieces equally among 4 or 5 flat metal skewers. Arrange the skewers on the grill and cook, turning once, until the chicken is cooked through, about 9 minutes total. Push the chicken from the skewers onto plates and serve immediately. Serves 4.
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
title: Chicken Kabobs with Tandoori Spices
